about_the_game:
From Inheritance to Prosperity: The Tavern Tales Demo

In the demo version of The Tavern Tales, you will take on the role of the owner of a small, old tavern inherited from your ancestors. Experience the core gameplay mechanics and immerse yourself in the medieval business atmosphere!

What Awaits You in the Demo?

  • Tavern Management – Buy ingredients, cook meals, pour drinks, and serve customers.

  • Licenses & Recipes – Discover new dishes and drinks, experiment with combinations, and find the best options for your guests.

  • Interior Upgrades – Add furniture and décor to create a cozy atmosphere.

  • Garden – Grow ingredients for food and beverages.

  • Serving the Elite – Attract influential guests and receive unique bonuses.

  • Notice Board – Stay updated on city news that may affect your business.

How Is It Different from the Full Version?

The demo offers a limited set of mechanics but retains the spirit and atmosphere of the game. Unlike the full version, expeditions and some additional tavern development features are unavailable. However, you will still enjoy an engaging gameplay experience that gives you a taste of the full adventure!

Test your skills and decide if you’re ready to create a true legend!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 / AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / RX VEGA-56
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Experience the medieval atmosphere in The Tavern Tales – a free demo version of the game! Manage your tavern, tend to your garden, cook delicious meals, send expeditions, and serve the elite. Upgrade your establishment, discover new recipes, and make your mark in history!
